text: The Wey Gaoshan is a luxury Minivan made by Wey a premium brand of Great Wall Motors (GWM) since 2023. == History and Features == The Wey Gaoshan was launched in 2023 and put on sale in China in October 2023. the Gaoshan has six and seven seats layout and the minivan is a Plug-in hybrid meaning that it has a 1.5 liter turbo gasoline engine that is combined with two electric motors and the Gaoshan also has a multi-mode DHT transmission. == Markets == The Wey Gaoshan is sold mainly in China but it was exported to the United Arab Emirates (UAE) where it arrived in Dubai. in other export markets its known as the Wey 80. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:Minivans Category:2020s automobiles
title: Wey Gaoshan
